reactClassComponentTernary.tsx(28,11): error TS2604: JSX element type 'XorY' does not have any construct or call signatures.


==== reactClassComponentTernary.tsx (1 errors) ====
    /// <reference path="/.lib/react16.d.ts" />
    
    import { Component } from "react";
    
    type PropsTest = Readonly<{
      test: string,
    }>;
    
    class X extends Component<PropsTest, { yo: string }> {
      static defaultProps = {
        test: "x",
      };
    
      render() {
        return "test";
      }
    }
    
    class Y extends Component<PropsTest, { hey: string }> {
      render() {
        return "test";
      }
    }
    
    const XorY = Math.random() > 0.5 ? X : Y;
    
    function z() {
      return <XorY test="test" />;
              ~~~~
!!! error TS2604: JSX element type 'XorY' does not have any construct or call signatures.
    }
